title: SolarWinds Storage Resource Monitor Profiler Module ScriptServlet SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of SolarWinds Storage Resource Monitor Profiler Module. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. 
The specific flaw exists within processing of the ScriptServlet servlet in the SolarWinds Storage Manager Web Services web server.  If the state parameter is set to the value editschedulerule, then the parameter ScriptSchedule is vulnerable to SQL injection.  This allows an attacker to run arbitrary code as SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: SolarWinds has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:http://www.solarwinds.com/documentation/storage/storagemanager/docs/ReleaseNotes/releaseNotes.htm
timeline:
2015-11-20 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2016-04-28 - Coordinated public release of advisory
